title: "Circuit Board Decor"
content: Welcome to Circuit Board Decor! Our website is dedicated to providing you with a unique and stylish way to decorate your digital devices. Our simple yet eye-catching abstract circuit board wallpaper is the perfect addition to any desktop or mobile screen. With shades of blue and green, this wallpaper is both calming and visually stimulating. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or just looking for a fresh new look, our circuit board wallpaper is sure to impress. So why settle for a boring default wallpaper when you can have something truly unique? Browse our selection today and give your device the upgrade it deserves!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of an abstract circuit board, in shades of blue and green."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
